env.description: Determines what type of network the connector is a part of. Can be: 'production', 'test'. Default: 'test'

databaseEnv.description: Determines which database environment setting is used to configure knex. Can be: 'production', 'development', 'test'. Default: 'test'

databaseConnectionString.description: Database connection URI passed to knexjs. Defaults to sqlite3 in memory

ilpAddress.description: ILP address of the connector. This property can be omitted if an account with `relation=parent` is configured under `accounts`.

minExpirationWindow.description: Minimum time the connector wants to budget for getting a message to the accounts its trading on. In milliseconds.

maxHoldWindow.description: Maximum duration (in milliseconds) the connector is willing to place funds on hold while waiting for the outcome of a transaction.

http2ServerPort.description: Which port the http2 server for incoming ilp over http requests should listen on. Default: 8843

adminApiPort.description: Which port the admin API should listen on. Default: 7780

adminApiHost.description: Host for the admin api to bind to. Warning: The admin API interface is public by default: '0.0.0.0'

adminApiAuth.description: Boolean to determine whether the admin api endpoints should use authentication.

settlementAdminApiPort.description: Which port the settlement admin API should listen on. Default: 7781

settlementAdminApiHost.description: Host for the settlement admin api to bind to. Note: The settlement admin API interface is private: '127.0.0.1'
